channel.title: Home Site of Larchea/Zurkin _
channel.description: Recent content on Home Site of Larchea/Zurkin _

item.title: Website Transfer Hop
item.description: With the old site broken on its links, it was time to swap out with a simpler, more understandable theme in Hugo. and MIT.

item.title: Contact
About Me
item.description: Salutations. I am human. I believe. INTJ-A, Hermit, bonnafied whackacow. This website will be run as a full test for me utilizing the great vast expanse known as the internet. Fascinating, no? I will attempt to post on an irregular basis, on things pretaining to the audio industry, and the Linux world. Both interests of mine. And anything else that comes to mind at times. My interests include, but are not limited to:

item.title: Droidcam and Other Commands
item.description: Things that I’ve had to use in these modern CoVid-19 times.

item.title: Xfce4/Xorg Fun
item.description: Moving from Xfce4 to LxQt to i3 made for an interesting week.

item.title: Recording Station
item.description: Something I’ve striven to complete in setting up fully is my audio workstation. Completing such a task in the small space which I have was an interesting challenge, but so far, I’ve been able to pull it off with moderate ease.
